testInfo.name: Тест по артиклям английского языка
testInfo.description: Тест на знание артиклей: a, an, the и нулевой артикль

questions.question: Choose the correct article: ___ apple a day keeps the doctor away.
Which sentence is correct?
options: I saw a cat in the garden.
I saw the cat in a garden.
I saw an cat in the garden.
questions.correctAnswer: I saw a cat in the garden.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: She is ___ honest person.
Choose the correct article: We need ___ water and ___ bread.
Fill in the blank: ___ sun is shining brightly today.
Which article is used with unique objects?
Fill in the blank: He plays ___ piano very well.
Choose the correct sentence:
options: I'm going to the United States.
I'm going to an United States.
I'm going to a United States.
questions.correctAnswer: I'm going to the United States.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: She has ___ university degree.
Fill in the blank: Let's have ___ lunch together.
Choose the correct article: He is ___ European citizen.
Fill in the blank: I need ___ hour to finish this work.
Which sentence is incorrect?
options: A cat is on the roof.
An apple fell from the tree.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: They live in ___ Netherlands.
